Purpose: To perform Beta-Catenin immunostaining on tissue sections to ensure consistent and accurate staining for pathological evaluation.
Container: Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue block or section mounted on a positively charged glass slide
Equipment: Microtome, 40 Â°C water bath, forced-air slide dryer/oven, pressure cooker or microwave for antigen retrieval, staining dishes/racks, microscope
